framework.name: ISO/IEC 27001
framework.description: Information security management system controls for risk-based security governance.

controls.title: Information security policy set
controls.summary_description: Define and maintain a policy set that establishes security objectives and requirements.
controls.implementation_guidance: Publish an ISMS policy set, assign owners, and review annually.

suggested_task_templates.title: Review ISMS policy set
suggested_task_templates.description: Confirm policy alignment with business objectives.

controls.title: Risk management process
controls.summary_description: Establish a repeatable risk assessment and treatment process.
controls.implementation_guidance: Maintain risk register entries with treatments and review cadence.

suggested_task_templates.title: Quarterly risk review
suggested_task_templates.description: Update risk register and treatment status.

controls.title: Asset inventory
controls.summary_description: Identify and manage information assets and owners.
controls.implementation_guidance: Maintain an asset register with ownership and classification.

controls.title: Access control policy
controls.summary_description: Grant access based on business need and least privilege.
controls.implementation_guidance: Apply role-based access controls and periodic access reviews.

controls.title: User lifecycle management
controls.summary_description: Manage joiner, mover, leaver processes for users.
controls.implementation_guidance: Track provisioning and deprovisioning within defined SLAs.

suggested_task_templates.title: Review user lifecycle logs
suggested_task_templates.description: Confirm leaver access is removed promptly.

controls.title: Operational procedures
controls.summary_description: Document and follow secure operational procedures.
controls.implementation_guidance: Maintain runbooks and verify changes are documented.

controls.title: Logging and monitoring
controls.summary_description: Collect logs and monitor events for anomalies.
controls.implementation_guidance: Centralize logging and review alerts routinely.

suggested_task_templates.title: Weekly log review
suggested_task_templates.description: Review critical alerts and document actions.

controls.title: Incident management
controls.summary_description: Respond to and report incidents with defined procedures.
controls.implementation_guidance: Maintain incident response playbooks and escalation paths.

suggested_task_templates.title: Run incident response drill
suggested_task_templates.description: Exercise response roles and update playbook.

controls.title: Business continuity
controls.summary_description: Plan for continuity and recovery of critical services.
controls.implementation_guidance: Define RTO/RPO targets and validate recovery steps.

suggested_task_templates.title: Test recovery procedures
suggested_task_templates.description: Run a recovery test and document outcomes.

controls.title: Compliance obligations
controls.summary_description: Identify and meet applicable legal and regulatory obligations.
controls.implementation_guidance: Maintain a compliance register and review obligations annually.
